name: The End Of Barathayuddha
description:
mp4 video 2048x858 w/ audio
"Taking up his mace, King Duryodhana of great energy, casting his glances on Bhimasena, challenged him to the encounter like an elephant challenging a rival elephant. Similarly, the valiant Bhima, taking up his adamantine mace, challenged the king like a lion challenging a lion. Duryodhana and Bhima, with uplifted maces, locked in that battle like two mountains with tall summits."

Shalyapharva, (1883-1896)
